## Summary 

```{r}
column(12, 
  column(3, 
    download_file(
      path = here('figs/totlbs.jpg'),
      output_name = "total-summary",
      output_extension = ".jpg",
      button_label = "Download plot",
      button_type = "warning",
      has_icon = TRUE,
      icon = "fa fa-save"
      )
  )
)
```

```{r, out.width = '80%'}
knitr::include_graphics(here('figs/totlbs.jpg'))
```
